MKA.title: Magi-Knights Awakening System
MKA.AbilityUseHint: Configure how you would like to use the {name} {type}.
MKA.AbilityUseUnavailableHint: There are no uses of this item remaining!
MKA.AbilityUseChargedHint: This {type} is charged and ready to use!
MKA.AbilityUseRechargeHint: This {type} is depleted and must be recharged!
MKA.AbilityUseNormalHint: This {type} has {value} of {max} uses per {per} remaining.
MKA.AbilityUseConsumableChargeHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 charge of {value} remaining.
MKA.AbilityUseConsumableQuantityHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 quantity of {quantity} remaining
MKA.AbilityUseConsumableDestroyHint: Using this {type} will consume its final charge and it will be destroyed.
MKA.AbilityConfigure: Configure Characteristic Checks and Saving Throws
MKA.AbilityConfigurationHint: Configure characteristic saving throw proficiency, saving throw bonuses, and check bonuses.
MKA.AbilityCheckGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all characteristic checks made by this actor.
MKA.ActionWarningNoItem: The requested item {item} no longer exists on Actor {name}
MKA.ActionWarningNoToken: You must have one or more controlled Tokens in order to use this option.
MKA.ActorWarningInvalidItem: {itemType} items cannot be added to a {actorType}.
MKA.AddEmbeddedItemPromptHint: Do you want to add these items to your character sheet?
MKA.AdvancementDeleteConfirmationMessage: Deleting this item will also delete all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
MKA.AdvancementHitPointsHint: Track the player's hit points for each level in the class.
MKA.AdvancementHitPointsEmptyError: Hit points must be rolled or the average value must be taken.
MKA.AdvancementHitPointsInvalidError: Hit points must be a valid whole number.
MKA.AdvancementItemGrantHint: Grant the character items (such as equipment, features, or spells) when they reach a certain level.
MKA.AdvancementItemGrantDropHint: Drop Items here to add them to the list granted by this advancement.
MKA.AdvancementItemGrantDuplicateWarning: That item already exists on this advancement.
MKA.AdvancementItemGrantRecursiveWarning: You cannot grant an item in its own advancement.
MKA.AdvancementItemGrantOptionalHint: If optional, players will be given the option to opt out of any of the following items, otherwise all of them are granted.
MKA.AdvancementLevelDownConfirmationMess: Leveling this class down will also undo all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
MKA.AdvancementManagerCloseMessage: If the advancement process is cancelled, choices made so far will be discarded and no changes will be made to the actor.
MKA.AdvancementManagerRestartConfirm: Are you sure you wish to undo all choices so far?
MKA.AdvancementScaleValueHint: A single value that changes as a class increases in level that is made available in roll formulas (such as a Monk's martial arts die).
MKA.AdvancementScaleValueIdentifierHint: This scale value for the current level will be available using @scale.{class}.{identifier} in a formula.
MKA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintString: Use this if you are unsure of the type of the scale values, or if the type does not matter.
MKA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintNumber: Use this for purely numerical values like rage damage bonus or number of uses per day.
MKA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintDice: Use this for dice values like bardic inspiration, sneak attack, or superiority dice.
MKA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintDistanc: Use this for numerical values that represent a distance, such as unarmored movement speed, or aura of protection radius.
MKA.ArmorConfigHint: Fill in the above box to override automatically calculated armor class.
MKA.BonusesHint: Define global bonuses as formulas which are added to certain rolls. For example: 1d4 + 2
MKA.BonusesInstructions: Configure character bonuses which are added to the appropriate dice roll
MKA.ClassIdentifierHint: This class's data will be accessible using @classes.{identifier} in roll formulas.
MKA.ClassMakeOriginalHint: First class taken by character used to determine certain class traits when multiclassing.
MKA.ConsumeWarningNoResource: {name} is designated to consume {type} but no resource is specified!
MKA.ConsumeWarningNoSource: The designated {type} source that {name} consumes no longer exists!
MKA.ConsumeWarningNoQuantity: {name} has run out of its designated {type}!
MKA.ConsumeWarningZeroAttribute: {name} has run out of its designated attribute resource pool!
MKA.ConsumableLastChargeWarn: This is the last charge of this unit and consuming it will also reduce the item's quantity by 1
MKA.CurrencyConvertHint: Convert all carried currency to the highest possible denomination to reduce the amount of coinage carried by the character. Be wary, this action cannot be undone.
MKA.DeathSaveCriticalSuccess: {name} critically succeeded on a death saving throw and has regained 1 Hit Point!
MKA.DeathSaveSuccess: {name} has survived with 3 death save successes and is now stable!
MKA.DeathSaveFailure: {name} has died with 3 death save failures!
MKA.DeathSaveUnnecessary: You do not need to roll death saves because you have a positive number of hit points or have already reached 3 successes or failures.
MKA.EffectUnavailableInfo: Source item must be equipped or attuned to activate these
MKA.FilterNoSpells: No spells found for this set of filters.
MKA.NoSpellLevels: This character has no spellcaster levels, but you may add spells manually.
MKA.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the MKA system.
MKA.FlagsDiamondSoulHint: Gain proficiency to all saving throws.
MKA.FlagsElvenAccuracyHint: Roll an extra d20 with advantage to Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha.
MKA.FlagsHalflingLuckyHint: Reroll ones when rolling d20 checks.
MKA.FlagsInitiativeAdvHint: Provided by feats or magical items.
MKA.FlagsJOATHint: Half-Proficiency to Characteristic Checks in which you are not already Proficient.
MKA.FlagsObservantHint: Provides a +5 to passive Perception and Investigation.
MKA.FlagsRemarkableAthleteHint: Half-Proficiency (rounded-up) to physical Characteristic Checks and Initiative.
MKA.FlagsWeaponCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for weapon attacks.
MKA.FlagsSpellCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for spell attacks.
MKA.FlagsMeleeCriticalDiceHint: A number of additional damage dice added to melee weapon critical hits.
MKA.HitDiceConfigHint: Adjust remaining hit dice levels for each class.
MKA.HitDiceWarn: {name} has no available {formula} Hit Dice remaining!
MKA.IdentifierError: Identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
MKA.LongRestHint: Take a long rest? On a long rest you will recover hit points, half your maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
MKA.LongRestResult: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points and {dice} Hit Dice.
MKA.LongRestResultHitDice: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {dice} Hit Dice.
MKA.LongRestResultHitPoints: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points.
MKA.MaxCharacterLevelExceededWarn: Character cannot be advanced past level {max}.
MKA.MaxClassLevelExceededWarn: Class cannot be advanced past level {max}.
MKA.MaxClassLevelMinimumWarn: Class must have at least one level.
MKA.Name: Character Name
MKA.PolymorphKeepClass: Keep proficiency bonus (leaves class items in sheet)
MKA.PolymorphKeepMental: Keep mental characteristic scores (Int, Wis, Cha)
MKA.PolymorphKeepPhysical: Keep physical characteristic scores (Str, Dex, Con)
MKA.PolymorphMergeSaves: Merge saving throw proficiencies (take the highest)
MKA.PolymorphRevertWarn: You do not have permission to revert this Actor's polymorphed state.
MKA.PolymorphWarn: You are not allowed to polymorph this actor!
MKA.MovementConfigHint: Configure the movement speed and special movement attributes of this creature.
MKA.NewDayHint: Recover limited use abilities which recharge "per day"?
MKA.SaveGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all saving throws made by this actor.
MKA.SensesConfigHint: Configure any special sensory perception abilities that this actor possesses.
MKA.ShortRestHint: Take a short rest? On a short rest you may spend remaining Hit Dice and recover primary or secondary resources.
MKA.ShortRestResult: {name} takes a short rest spending {dice} Hit Dice to recover {health} Hit Points.
MKA.SkillGlobalBonusCheckHint: This bonus applies to all skill checks made by this actor.
MKA.SpellCastNoSlots: You have no available {level} spell slots with which to cast {name}
MKA.SubclassIdentifierHint: This identifier should match the identifier on the parent class to ensure they are properly linked.
MKA.SubclassAssignmentError: {class} already has a subclass. Remove the existing '{subclass}' subclass before adding a new one.
MKA.SubclassDuplicateError: A subclass with the identifier {identifier} already exists on this actor.
MKA.SubclassMismatchWarn: {name} subclass has no matching class with identifier '{class}'.
MKA.VehicleActionsHint: Actions taken with full crew complement
MKA.WarnBadACFormula: The provided AC formula could not be evaluated.
MKA.WarnCantAddMultipleAdvancements: It is not currently possible to add multiple items with advancements to an actor at the same time. Please add them individually.
MKA.WarnMultipleArmor: More than one suit of armor equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
MKA.WarnMultipleShields: More than one shield equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
MKA.description: A system for playing the fifth edition of the worlds most popular roleplaying game in the Foundry Virtual Tabletop environment.
MACRO.MKAMissingTargetWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' does not have an {type} with name '{name}'.
MACRO.MKAMultipleTargetsWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' has more than one {type} with name '{name}'. The first match will be chosen.
MACRO.MKANoActorSelected: No selected or assigned actor could be found to target with macro.
MACRO.MKAUnownedWarn: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items
MIGRATION.MKABegin: Applying MKA System Migration for version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.
MIGRATION.MKAComplete: MKA System Migration to version {version} completed!
MIGRATION.MKAVersionTooOldWarning: Your MKA system data is from too old a Foundry version and cannot be reliably migrated to the latest version. The process will be attempted, but errors may occur.
SETTINGS.MKAAllowPolymorphingL: Allow players to polymorph their own actors.
SETTINGS.MKAAutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.MKAAutoSpellTemplateL: When a spell is cast, defaults to begin the process to create the corresponding Measured Template if any (requires TRUSTED or higher player role)
SETTINGS.MKACriticalMaxDiceL: Make critical hits more deadly by maximizing the values of base damage dice.
SETTINGS.MKACriticalModifiersL: Make critical hits more deadly by multiplying non-dice modifiers in addition to rolled dice.
SETTINGS.MKACurWtL: Carried currency affects character encumbrance following the rules on PHB pg. 143.
SETTINGS.MKADiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.MKAHonorL: Enable the use of the optional Honor characteristic score. Requires the world to be reloaded.
SETTINGS.MKAInitTBL: Append the raw Dexterity characteristic score to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.MKAMetricL: Replaces all reference to lbs with kgs and updates the encumbrance calculations to use metric weight units.
SETTINGS.MKANoAdvancementsL: Do not prompt for level-up or character creation choices.
SETTINGS.MKANoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.MKAProfL: Configure proficiency modifier to use a fixed bonus or a dice roll. Reloading the world is required for this change to take effect.
SETTINGS.MKARestL: Configure which rest variant should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.MKASanityL: Enable the use of the optional Sanity ability score. Requires the world to be reloaded.
